arts.ttl: After routing Real Madrid in Club World Cup, PSG eyes Chelsea and historic quadruple
arts.sum: PSG moved on to Sunday’s final against Chelsea in the first expanded Club World Cup with a chance to win its fourth major title of the season exactly 100 days after it clinched Ligue 1 on April 5 . A 4-0 rout of Real Madrid in a Club World Cup semifinal following a 5-0 wipeout of Inter Milan in the Champions League final reinforced that PSG may be the dominant soccer team of the mid-2020s.

arts.ttl: Penny for Mbappe's thoughts: PSG run riot against Real Madrid to reach CWC final
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain run riot against Real Madrid, recording a breathtaking 4-0 victory to book their place in the Club World Cup final against Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Paris St Germain set up final against Chelsea by brushing aside Real Madrid
arts.sum: The pair will meet in the Club World Cup final on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Why isn’t Trent Alexander-Arnold playing for Real Madrid vs PSG? Club World Cup 2025
arts.sum: The English full-back will miss the game at New Jersey’s MetLife Stadium due to muscle discomfort in his right leg, a problem that has lingered since Monday’s training session in Palm Beach – the final workout before the squad endured a grueling journey to New York. No Trent, no Huijsen for Madrid

arts.ttl: Why Trent Alexander-Arnold Isn’t Playing for Real Madrid vs. PSG
arts.sum: Prior to the injury, Alexander-Arnold had started every match of Los Blancos’ Club World Cup run to the semifinals. Real Madrid will have to take on Paris Saint-Germain in the Club World Cup semifinals without Trent Alexander-Arnold.

arts.ttl: PSG v Real Madrid: Club World Cup semi-final – live
arts.sum: Live updates from 8pm BST kick-off at MetLife Stadium Email Scott | Revenge in air as Mbappé and PSG clash These clubs last met in 2022 in the Champions League. PSG looked like winning the round-of-16 tie, but threw away a two-goal aggregate lead in the second half of the second leg at the Bernabeu, Karim Benzema stunning them with a 16-minute hat-trick. At which point we all began to wonder whether PSG would ever win the trophy they craved more than any other. But here we are now. Three years is an awfully long time in football. Here’s how the two teams made it through the quarters. A couple of games that got super-hectic towards the end. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Trent absent for blockbuster clash: Why is Real Madrid defender not involved vs. PSG?
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold is not in the Real Madrid squad for Wednesday's Club World Cup semi-final against Paris Saint-Germain.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé leaves Real Madrid fans scratching their heads with cryptic post before PSG clash
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé faces former club Paris Saint-Germain for the first time since leaving for Real Madrid on Wednesday (July 9), with the European heavyweights going head to head in the semifinals of the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup in New Jersey. To the bemusement of Real Madrid fans, Mbappé posted a picture on Instagram Stories of him playing - celebrating a goal or calling for a pass?

arts.ttl: PSG vs Real Madrid live: Club World Cup semi-final team news and updates
arts.sum: Two European giants face off with a place in the Club World Cup finals at stake in New Jersey

arts.ttl: Paris Saint-Germain vs Real Madrid LIVE: Club World Cup match stream, latest team news, lineup, TV, prediction
arts.sum: A spot in the final is on the line!
